def_cn: （尤指从行为中表现出来的）态度，看法
def_en: Your attitude to something is the way that you think and feel about it, especially when this shows in the way you behave.

def_cn: 个人风格;（尤指）咄咄逼人的作派
def_en: If you refer to someone as a person with attitude, you mean that they have a striking and individual style of behaviour, especially a forceful or aggressive one.
Your attitude of mind is your general way of thinking and feeling.
